title: GIGGI Fabric Lamp Shades with Golden Inner Light Shade Ceiling – Modern Lampshades for Ceiling Lights, Lamp Shades for Table Lamps, Floor Lamps, Living Room, Bedroom, Home Décor (Grey, 8")
features: LUXURY FABRIC LAMP SHADES WITH GOLD INNER: Elevate your lighting with these premium drum lampshades for ceiling lights featuring reflective gold inner lining. Perfect for use as ceiling light shade, table lamp shade, or floor lamp shade in bedrooms, living rooms, and offices. Light Shade Size (Medium 10"): 25 x 25 x 15 cm.

DURABLE & STYLISH WITH VERSATILE OPTIONS: Crafted with premium materials for long-lasting performance and timeless style. Available in 8", 10", 12", and 14" sizes in Beige, Grey, Green or Black. Choose a soft beige lampshade, a sleek grey light shade, a bold green or blue lampshade to create a cozy ambiance.

SUITABLE FOR CEILING, TABLE & FLOOR LAMPS: This light shade ceiling is compatible with pendant light shade, ceiling lampshades, and can also be used as lampshade for table lamps & floor lamps, making it ideal for bedrooms, living rooms, or dining areas.

EASY FIT WITH INCLUDED REDUCER RING: These non-electrical lamp shades ceiling includes plastic reducer rings for compatibility with bulb holders like B22, E14, E26, and E27, ensuring quick and tool-free installation. Bulbs & light fitting Not supplied.

PREMIUM DESIGN FROM A TRUSTED LIGHTING BRAND: Giggi is a leading lighting brand in the UK. We are committed to providing high-quality, affordable lighting solutions for every household. Explore our shopfront for ceiling lampshades, lampshades for table lamps, chandeliers, ceiling lights, and more. Your satisfaction is our priority—contact us for prompt assistance.
description: Product Description Upgrade your home with the Giggi Premium Fabric Drum Lamp Shades with golden inner lining, designed for elegance and functionality. These versatile ceiling light shades are perfect as ceiling lamp shade, table lamp shades, or floor lamp shades, enhancing any room with their modern appeal. Whether you are looking for a small or a large lampshade, Giggi lamps shades are available in four sizes— small (8"), medium (10"), large (12"), and extra large (14") — these shades suit any space, from cozy nooks to expansive living areas. These versatile ceiling light shades are perfect as ceiling lamp shade, table lamp shades, or floor lamp shades. With their drum design, these non-electrical easy-fit pendant lamp shade can be used upright or inverted. Perfect pendant lampshade ceiling or light shades for table lamp Or floor lamp. Giggi luxury lightshades with golden inner are available in different colours. Choose Beige or cream light shade for a warm, neutral tone, grey lampshade for a sleek and stylish look, green fabric lampshade for a nature-inspired aesthetic or blue lamp shade for bold, dramatic decor. Installation is hassle-free with the included reducer rings, ensuring compatibility with bulb holders like B22, E14, E26, and E27. These non-electrical lamp shades for ceiling light require no tools, making them ideal for quick and stylish home updates.
